RefundHandler - Class in il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.fsm.handler
Implementation of refund on Debit charge.
The amount is added to the Account's balance.

ReserveHandler - Class in il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.fsm.handler
Implementation of reserve on Debit charge.
A new charge of Debit type is created.
The amount is removed from the Account's balance and is added to the Account's Reserved balance
ReserveHandler() - Constructor for class il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.fsm.handler.ReserveHandler
 
run() - Method in class il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.bl.BusinessLogic
Prepare an input, iterate over the requests and write results.
Request and response are a String terminated by a '\n' sign.
This method calls BusinessLogic.handleRequest(String) to handle each request
and uses java.lang.StringBuilder.StringBuilder to aggregate the responses.
